jobDetails.subtitle: WHO WE ARE
jobDetails.data: MyEtherWallet is Free, open-source, client-side interface for generating Ethereum wallets & more. We enable our users to interact with the Ethereum blockchain easily & securely. We are looking to hire team players with a desire to learn about the blockchain world and help grow our community.

jobDetails.subtitle: WHO ARE WE LOOKING FOR
jobDetails.data: We are looking for an experienced, Full Stack Developer with deep knowledge of web technologies including Node.js, Typescript/JavaScript, and VUE.js frameworks. Also the candidate must possess knowledge in database development and implementation process and ideally know one or more: MongoDB, RethinkDB, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB etc.

jobDetails.subtitle: JOB SUMMARY
jobDetails.data: The chosen candidate will be working in an agile, startup environment as a senior project developer. They will design, develop, and deliver new full-stack web applications, and oversee development of our planned mobile integration. The candidate will be working with our in-house team, as well as, remote team and will ensure that the project is scoped, resourced, and delivered as a professional product. A candidate will ensure partner and user satisfaction throughout the development cycle and after project completion. They will be expected to participate in management meetings and help set strategies and resources for the project.

jobDetails.subtitle: KEY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
data: Perform high development standards, especially for code quality, code reviews, unit testing, continuous integration and deployment
Develop proof of concept and integrate it into a working prototype from back end to front end

jobDetails.subtitle: REQUIREMENTS
data: NODE.js, Javascript or Typescript, HTML, CSS, VUE.js, Git, Sass
Knowledge in SQL and no-SQL databases, such as, PostgreSQL and Amazon

jobDetails.subtitle: DynamoDB
data: Understanding of REST API design and experience with GraphQL
Experience in creating user authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments
Ability to integrate multiple data sources and databases into one system
Knowledge on management of the hosting environment, including database administration and scaling an application to support load changes
Demonstrated knowledge of software development processes
Driven decision maker, excellent problem solver, and fast learner

jobDetails.subtitle: Plus
jobDetails.data: Knowledge of blockchain technology in particular Ethereum; Web3; Geth, cryptocurrencies, extensive AWS experience, such as working with S3, AWS Lambda, Docker and love of dogs. LOCAL CANDIDATES ONLY - SORRY THIS IS NOT A REMOTE POSITION

jobDetails.subtitle: COVID-19 considerations
jobDetails.data: Everyone is currently working remotely, but we hope to get back into the office in Downtown LA when its safe and appropriate.

jobDetails.subtitle: Application Question(s)
data: Do you have any knowledge of blockchain technology?

jobDetails.subtitle: WHO WE ARE
jobDetails.data: MyEtherWallet is Free, open-source, client-side interface for generating Ethereum wallets & more. We enable our users to interact with the Ethereum blockchain easily & securely. We are looking to hire team players with a desire to learn about the blockchain world and help grow our community.

jobDetails.subtitle: WHO ARE WE LOOKING FOR
jobDetails.data: We are looking for a customer service representative with a profound understanding of Blockchain. Our potential candidate must be able to commit full time from 9 am-6pm, as well as be comfortable handling confidential information and must sign a nondisclosure agreement.

jobDetails.subtitle: JOB SUMMARY
jobDetails.data: You as a candidate will provide customer support to users that have questions, concerns or confusion that occur when using our technology. As well as, provide feedback on secure use of online wallets. You must be able to answer support tickets through email, our company’s social media accounts and more. As a candidate you must be prepared to be the voice of the brand, and maintain a strong and good relationship between our clients and our team members. Paid Training is included.

jobDetails.subtitle: KEY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
data: Communicate with clients through email, Facebook messages, Twitter mentions, Reddit posts and more

Resolve issues by understanding why the client is seeking assistance; determining the cause of the problem; selecting and explaining the best solution for the client's problem; following up to ensure resolution
Provide calm and prompt responses to clients
Being able to recognize and forward complicated support issues to the supervising staff
Manage a large amount of support tickets

jobDetails.subtitle: REQUIREMENTS
data: Be familiar with Blockchain, online wallets
Be able to commit full time
Ability to multitask, prioritize and manage time effectively
Being able to handle sensitive and private information
